description: This file defines a route guard function for Vue.js navigation, ensuring authentication before route access.

methods.name: export function requireAuth(to: RouteLocationNormalized, _from: RouteLocationNormalized, next: N/ requireAuth
methods.description: A route guard function that checks user authentication status and redirects to login if not authenticated.
